Sequela Name: Severe skin disease due to onchocerciasis

Health State Lay Description: has a visible physical deformity that is sore and itchy. Other people stare and comment, which causes the person to worry. The person has trouble sleeping and concentrating.

Health State Name: Distance vision, severe impairment

Sequela Name: Mild behavioral problems due to meningitis
Health State Name: Attention deficit hyperactivity disorder
Health State Lay Description: is hyperactive and has difficulty concentrating, remembering things, and completing tasks.

Sequela Name: Borderline intellectual disability due to meningitis
Health State Name: Borderline intellectual functioning
Health State Lay Description: is slow in learning at school. As an adult, the person has some difficulty doing complex or unfamiliar tasks but otherwise functions independently.

Sequela Name: Mild intellectual disability due to meningitis
Health State Name: Intellectual disability / mental retardation, mild
Health State Lay Description: has low intelligence and is slow in learning at school. As an adult, the person can live independently, but often needs help to raise children and can only work at simple supervised jobs.

Sequela Name: Mild hearing loss due to meningitis
Health State Name: Hearing loss, mild
Health State Lay Description: has great difficulty hearing and understanding another person talking in a noisy place (for example, on an urban street).

Sequela Name: Moderate hearing loss due to meningitis
Health State Name: Hearing loss, moderate
Health State Lay Description: is unable to hear and understand another person talking in a noisy place (for example, on an urban street), and has difficulty hearing another person talking even in a quiet place or on the phone.

Sequela Name: Severe hearing loss due to meningitis
Health State Name: Hearing loss, severe
Health State Lay Description: is unable to hear and understand another person talking, even in a quiet place, and unable to take part in a phone conversation. Difficulties with communicating and relating to others cause emotional impact at times (for example worry or depression).

Sequela Name: Profound hearing loss due to meningitis
Health State Name: Hearing loss, profound
Health State Lay Description: is unable to hear and understand another person talking, even in a quiet place, is unable to take part in a phone conversation, and has great difficulty hearing anything in any other situation. Difficulties with communicating and relating to othersoften cause worry, depression, and loneliness.

Sequela Name: Complete hearing loss due to meningitis
Health State Name: Hearing loss, complete
Health State Lay Description: cannot hear at all in any situation, including even the loudest sounds, and cannot communicate verbally or use a phone. Difficulties with communicating and relating to others often cause worry, depression or loneliness.

Sequela Name: Mild hearing loss with ringing due to meningitis
Health State Name: Hearing loss, mild, with ringing
Health State Lay Description: has great difficulty hearing and understanding another person talking in a noisy place (for example, on an urban street), and sometimes has annoying ringing in the ears.

Sequela Name: Moderate hearing loss with ringing due to meningitis
Health State Name: Hearing loss, moderate, with ringing
Health State Lay Description: is unable to hear and understand another person talking in a noisy place (for example, on an urban street), and has difficulty hearing another person talking even in a quiet place or on the phone, and has annoying ringing in the ears for more than 5 minutes at a time, almost everyday.

Sequela Name: Severe hearing loss with ringing due to meningitis
Health State Name: Hearing loss, severe, with ringing
Health State Lay Description: is unable to hear and understand another person talking, even in a quiet place, and unable to take part in a phone conversation, and has annoying ringing in the ears for more than 5 minutes at a time, almost everyday. Difficulties with communicating and relating to others cause emotional impact at times (for example worry or depression).

Sequela Name: Profound hearing loss with ringing due to meningitis
Health State Name: Hearing loss, profound, with ringing
Health State Lay Description: is unable to hear and understand another person talking, even in a quiet place, is unable to take part in a phone conversation, has great difficulty hearing anything in any other situation, and has annoying ringing in the ears for more than 5 minutes at a time, several times a day. Difficulties with communicating and relating to others often cause worry, depression, or loneliness.

Sequela Name: Complete hearing loss with ringing due to meningitis
Health State Name: Hearing loss, complete, with ringing
Health State Lay Description: cannot hear at all in any situation, including even the loudest sounds, and cannot communicate verbally or use a phone, and has very annoying ringing in the ears for more than half of the day. Difficulties with communicating and relating to others often cause worry, depression or loneliness.

Health State Lay Description: feels very weak, tired and short of breath, and has problems with activities that require physical effort or deep concentration.

Sequela Name: Diagnosis and primary therapy phase of mouth cancer
Health State Name: Cancer, diagnosis and primary therapy
Health State Lay Description: has pain, nausea, fatigue, weight loss and high anxiety.

Sequela Name: Metastatic phase of mouth cancer
Health State Name: Cancer, metastatic
Health State Lay Description: has severe pain, extreme fatigue, weight loss and high anxiety.

Sequela Name: Terminal phase of mouth cancer
Health State Name: Terminal phase, with medication (for cancers, end-stage kidney/liver disease)
Health State Lay Description: has lost a lot of weight and regularly uses strong medication to avoid constant pain. The person has no appetite, feels nauseous, and needs to spend most of the day in bed.

Sequela Name: Controlled phase of mouth cancer
Health State Name: Generic uncomplicated disease: worry and daily medication
Health State Lay Description: has a chronic disease that requires medication every day and causes some worry but minimal interference with daily activities.

Sequela Name: Severe multiple sclerosis

Health State Lay Description: has great difficulty hearing and understanding another person talking in a noisy place (for example, on an urban street).

Sequela Name: Moderate hearing loss due to age-related and other hearing loss
Health State Name: Hearing loss, moderate
Health State Lay Description: is unable to hear and understand another person talking in a noisy place (for example, on an urban street), and has difficulty hearing another person talking even in a quiet place or on the phone.

Sequela Name: Severe hearing loss due to age-related and other hearing loss
Health State Name: Hearing loss, severe
Health State Lay Description: is unable to hear and understand another person talking, even in a quiet place, and unable to take part in a phone conversation. Difficulties with communicating and relating to others cause emotional impact at times (for example worry or depression).

Sequela Name: Profound hearing loss due to age-related and other hearing loss
Health State Name: Hearing loss, profound
Health State Lay Description: is unable to hear and understand another person talking, even in a quiet place, is unable to take part in a phone conversation, and has great difficulty hearing anything in any other situation. Difficulties with communicating and relating to othersoften cause worry, depression, and loneliness.

Sequela Name: Complete hearing loss due to age-related and other hearing loss
Health State Name: Hearing loss, complete
Health State Lay Description: cannot hear at all in any situation, including even the loudest sounds, and cannot communicate verbally or use a phone. Difficulties with communicating and relating to others often cause worry, depression or loneliness.

Sequela Name: Mild hearing loss with ringing due to age-related and other hearing loss
Health State Name: Hearing loss, mild, with ringing
Health State Lay Description: has great difficulty hearing and understanding another person talking in a noisy place (for example, on an urban street), and sometimes has annoying ringing in the ears.

Sequela Name: Moderate hearing loss with ringing due to age-related and other hearing loss
Health State Name: Hearing loss, moderate, with ringing
Health State Lay Description: is unable to hear and understand another person talking in a noisy place (for example, on an urban street), and has difficulty hearing another person talking even in a quiet place or on the phone, and has annoying ringing in the ears for more than 5 minutes at a time, almost everyday.

Sequela Name: Severe hearing loss with ringing due to age-related and other hearing loss
Health State Name: Hearing loss, severe, with ringing
Health State Lay Description: is unable to hear and understand another person talking, even in a quiet place, and unable to take part in a phone conversation, and has annoying ringing in the ears for more than 5 minutes at a time, almost everyday. Difficulties with communicating and relating to others cause emotional impact at times (for example worry or depression).

Sequela Name: Profound hearing loss with ringing due to age-related and other hearing loss
Health State Name: Hearing loss, profound, with ringing
Health State Lay Description: is unable to hear and understand another person talking, even in a quiet place, is unable to take part in a phone conversation, has great difficulty hearing anything in any other situation, and has annoying ringing in the ears for more than 5 minutes at a time, several times a day. Difficulties with communicating and relating to others often cause worry, depression, or loneliness.

Sequela Name: Complete hearing loss with ringing due to age-related and other hearing loss
Health State Name: Hearing loss, complete, with ringing
Health State Lay Description: cannot hear at all in any situation, including even the loudest sounds, and cannot communicate verbally or use a phone, and has very annoying ringing in the ears for more than half of the day. Difficulties with communicating and relating to others often cause worry, depression or loneliness.

Sequela Name: Moderately severe hearing loss due to age-related and other hearing loss
Health State Name: Hearing loss, moderately severe
Health State Lay Description: (custom DW from hearing loss impairment envelope)

Sequela Name: Moderately severe hearing loss with ringing due to age-related and other hearing loss
Health State Name: Hearing loss, moderately severe, with ringing
Health State Lay Description: (custom DW from hearing loss impairment envelope)

Sequela Name: Mild rheumatoid arthritis
Health State Name: Musculoskeletal problems, upper limbs, moderate
Health State Lay Description: has moderate pain and stiffness in the arms and hands, which causes difficulty lifting, carrying, and holding things, and trouble sleeping because of the pain.

Sequela Name: Moderate rheumatoid arthritis
Health State Name: Musculoskeletal problems, generalized, moderate
Health State Lay Description: has pain and deformity in most joints, causing difficulty moving around, getting up and down, and using the hands for lifting and carrying. The person often feels fatigue.

Sequela Name: Severe rheumatoid arthritis
Health State Name: Musculoskeletal problems, generalized, severe
Health State Lay Description: has severe, constant pain and deformity in most joints, causing difficulty moving around, getting up and down, eating, dressing, lifting, carrying and using the hands. The person often feels sadness, anxiety and extreme fatigue.

Health State Name: Asymptomatic

Sequela Name: Severe motor and cognitive impairment due to anencephaly
Health State Name: Motor plus cognitive impairments, severe
Health State Lay Description: cannot move around without help, and cannot lift or hold objects, get dressed or sit upright. The person also has very low intelligence, speaks few words, and needs constant supervision and help with all daily activities.

Sequela Name: Incontinence due to encephalocele
Health State Name: Urinary incontinence

Sequela Name: Borderline intellectual disability due to encephalocele
Health State Name: Borderline intellectual functioning
Health State Lay Description: is slow in learning at school. As an adult, the person has some difficulty doing complex or unfamiliar tasks but otherwise functions independently.

Sequela Name: Mild intellectual disability due to encephalocele
Health State Name: Intellectual disability / mental retardation, mild
Health State Lay Description: has low intelligence and is slow in learning at school. As an adult, the person can live independently, but often needs help to raise children and can only work at simple supervised jobs.

Sequela Name: Moderate intellectual disability due to encephalocele
Health State Name: Intellectual disability / mental retardation, moderate
Health State Lay Description: has low intelligence, and is slow in learning to speak and to do even simple tasks. As an adult, the person requires a lot of support to live independently and raise children. The person can only work at the simplest supervised jobs.

Sequela Name: Severe intellectual disability due to encephalocele
Health State Name: Intellectual disability / mental retardation, severe
Health State Lay Description: has very low intelligence and cannot speak more than a few words, needs constant supervision and help with most daily activities, and can do only the simplest tasks.

Sequela Name: Profound intellectual disability due to encephalocele
Health State Name: Intellectual disability / mental retardation, profound
Health State Lay Description: has very low intelligence, has almost no language, and does not understand even the most basic requests or instructions. The person requires constant supervision and help for all activities.

Sequela Name: Severe motor impairment due to encephalocele

Sequela Name: Mild motor impairment and mild intellectual disability due to encephalocele
Health State Name: Motor plus cognitive impairments, mild
Health State Lay Description: has some difficulty in moving around but is able to walk without help. The person is slow in learning at school. As an adult, the person has some difficulty doing complex or unfamiliar tasks but otherwise functions independently.

Sequela Name: Moderate motor impairment and moderate intellectual disability due to encephalocele
Health State Name: Motor plus cognitive impairments, moderate
Health State Lay Description: has some difficulty in moving around, holding objects, dressing and sitting upright, but can walk without help. The person has low intelligence and is slow in learning to speak and to do simple tasks.

Sequela Name: Mild dementia due to Down syndrome
Health State Name: Dementia, mild
Health State Lay Description: has some trouble remembering recent events, and finds it hard to concentrate and make decisions and plans.

Sequela Name: Moderate dementia due to Down syndrome
Health State Name: Dementia, moderate
Health State Lay Description: has memory problems and confusion, feels disoriented, at times hears voices that are not real, and needs help with some daily activities.

Sequela Name: Severe dementia due to Down syndrome
Health State Name: Dementia, severe
Health State Lay Description: has complete memory loss; no longer recognizes close family members; and requires help with all daily activities.

Sequela Name: Borderline intellectual disability due to Down syndrome
Health State Name: Borderline intellectual functioning
Health State Lay Description: is slow in learning at school. As an adult, the person has some difficulty doing complex or unfamiliar tasks but otherwise functions independently.

Sequela Name: Mild intellectual disability due to Down syndrome
Health State Name: Intellectual disability / mental retardation, mild
Health State Lay Description: has low intelligence and is slow in learning at school. As an adult, the person can live independently, but often needs help to raise children and can only work at simple supervised jobs.

Sequela Name: Moderate intellectual disability due to Down syndrome
Health State Name: Intellectual disability / mental retardation, moderate
Health State Lay Description: has low intelligence, and is slow in learning to speak and to do even simple tasks. As an adult, the person requires a lot of support to live independently and raise children. The person can only work at the simplest supervised jobs.

Sequela Name: Severe intellectual disability due to Down syndrome
Health State Name: Intellectual disability / mental retardation, severe
Health State Lay Description: has very low intelligence and cannot speak more than a few words, needs constant supervision and help with most daily activities, and can do only the simplest tasks.

Sequela Name: Profound intellectual disability due to Down syndrome
Health State Name: Intellectual disability / mental retardation, profound
Health State Lay Description: has very low intelligence, has almost no language, and does not understand even the most basic requests or instructions. The person requires constant supervision and help for all activities.

Sequela Name: Mild hearing loss due to other congenital anomalies
Health State Name: Hearing loss, mild
Health State Lay Description: has great difficulty hearing and understanding another person talking in a noisy place (for example, on an urban street).

Sequela Name: Moderate hearing loss due to other congenital anomalies
Health State Name: Hearing loss, moderate
Health State Lay Description: is unable to hear and understand another person talking in a noisy place (for example, on an urban street), and has difficulty hearing another person talking even in a quiet place or on the phone.

Sequela Name: Severe hearing loss due to other congenital anomalies
Health State Name: Hearing loss, severe
Health State Lay Description: is unable to hear and understand another person talking, even in a quiet place, and unable to take part in a phone conversation. Difficulties with communicating and relating to others cause emotional impact at times (for example worry or depression).

Sequela Name: Profound hearing loss due to other congenital anomalies
Health State Name: Hearing loss, profound
Health State Lay Description: is unable to hear and understand another person talking, even in a quiet place, is unable to take part in a phone conversation, and has great difficulty hearing anything in any other situation. Difficulties with communicating and relating to othersoften cause worry, depression, and loneliness.

Sequela Name: Complete hearing loss due to other congenital anomalies
Health State Name: Hearing loss, complete
Health State Lay Description: cannot hear at all in any situation, including even the loudest sounds, and cannot communicate verbally or use a phone. Difficulties with communicating and relating to others often cause worry, depression or loneliness.

Sequela Name: Mild hearing loss with ringing due to other congenital anomalies
Health State Name: Hearing loss, mild, with ringing
Health State Lay Description: has great difficulty hearing and understanding another person talking in a noisy place (for example, on an urban street), and sometimes has annoying ringing in the ears.

Sequela Name: Moderate hearing loss with ringing due to other congenital anomalies
Health State Name: Hearing loss, moderate, with ringing
Health State Lay Description: is unable to hear and understand another person talking in a noisy place (for example, on an urban street), and has difficulty hearing another person talking even in a quiet place or on the phone, and has annoying ringing in the ears for more than 5 minutes at a time, almost everyday.

Sequela Name: Severe hearing loss with ringing due to other congenital anomalies
Health State Name: Hearing loss, severe, with ringing
Health State Lay Description: is unable to hear and understand another person talking, even in a quiet place, and unable to take part in a phone conversation, and has annoying ringing in the ears for more than 5 minutes at a time, almost everyday. Difficulties with communicating and relating to others cause emotional impact at times (for example worry or depression).

Sequela Name: Profound hearing loss with ringing due to other congenital anomalies
Health State Name: Hearing loss, profound, with ringing
Health State Lay Description: is unable to hear and understand another person talking, even in a quiet place, is unable to take part in a phone conversation, has great difficulty hearing anything in any other situation, and has annoying ringing in the ears for more than 5 minutes at a time, several times a day. Difficulties with communicating and relating to others often cause worry, depression, or loneliness.

Sequela Name: Complete hearing loss with ringing due to other congenital anomalies
Health State Name: Hearing loss, complete, with ringing
Health State Lay Description: cannot hear at all in any situation, including even the loudest sounds, and cannot communicate verbally or use a phone, and has very annoying ringing in the ears for more than half of the day. Difficulties with communicating and relating to others often cause worry, depression or loneliness.

Health State Name: Hearing loss, moderately severe
Health State Lay Description: (custom DW from hearing loss impairment envelope)

Sequela Name: Moderately severe hearing loss with ringing due to other congenital anomalies
Health State Name: Hearing loss, moderately severe, with ringing
Health State Lay Description: (custom DW from hearing loss impairment envelope)

Sequela Name: Post-acute fatigue syndrome due to COVID-19
Health State Name: Infectious disease, post-acute consequences (fatigue, emotional lability, insomnia)
Health State Lay Description: is always tired and easily upset. The person feels pain all over the body and is depressed.

Sequela Name: Post-acute mild cognitive symptoms due to COVID-19
Health State Name: Dementia, mild
Health State Lay Description: has some trouble remembering recent events, and finds it hard to concentrate and make decisions and plans.

Sequela Name: Post-acute severe cognitive symptoms due to COVID-19
Health State Name: Dementia, moderate
Health State Lay Description: has memory problems and confusion, feels disoriented, at times hears voices that are not real, and needs help with some daily activities.

Sequela Name: Post-acute mild respiratory symptoms due to COVID-19
Health State Name: COPD and other chronic respiratory problems, mild
Health State Lay Description: has cough and shortness of breath after heavy physical activity, but is able to walk long distances and climb stairs.

Sequela Name: Post-acute moderate respiratory symptoms due to COVID-19
Health State Name: COPD and other chronic respiratory problems, moderate
Health State Lay Description: has cough, wheezing and shortness of breath, even after light physical activity. The person feels tired and can walk only short distances or climb only a few stairs.

Sequela Name: Post-acute severe respiratory symptoms due to COVID-19
Health State Name: COPD and other chronic respiratory problems, severe
Health State Lay Description: has cough, wheezing and shortness of breath all the time. The person has great difficulty walking even short distances or climbing any stairs, feels tired when at rest, and is anxious.

Sequela Name: Asymptomatic COVID-19 cases
Health State Name: Asymptomatic

Sequela Name: Mild acute COVID-19
Health State Name: Infectious disease, acute episode, mild
Health State Lay Description: has a low fever and mild discomfort , but no difficulty with daily activities.

Sequela Name: Moderate acute COVID-19
Health State Name: Infectious disease, acute episode, moderate
Health State Lay Description: has a fever and aches, and feels weak, which causes some difficulty with daily activities.

Sequela Name: Severe acute COVID-19
Health State Name: Infectious disease, acute episode, severe
Health State Lay Description: has a high fever and pain, and feels very weak, which causes great difficulty with daily activities.

Sequela Name: Critical acute COVID-19
Health State Name: Intensive care unit admission
Health State Lay Description: is very ill and often asleep or unconscious; when awake cannot move in bed, cannot speak, is completely dependent on others and is anxious

Sequela Name: Guillain-Barré Syndrome due to COVID-19
Health State Name: Spinal cord lesion below neck level (treated)
Health State Lay Description: is paralyzed from the waist down, cannot feel or move the legs and has difficulties with urine and bowel control. The person uses a wheelchair to move around.
